home.title: I create cool stuff for the web.

content.p0: Hello! I’m Saul, software engineer from Spain based in London. I’m into coding, arts, games, philosophy and sports.
content.p1: I attended my first computer class when I was seven and have always been fascinated by the world of computers. After school I completed a degree in Industrial Design and later in Audio-Visual Communications. To deepen my understanding of computer science, I moved to Scotland to study Computer Arts. Since then, I have worked as designer in Prague and as digital designer in Coruña. The last few years, I spent working as a software engineer in the UK in the field of e-learning.
content.p2: I enjoy building web apps in my free time, learning new skills and exploring new paths.

content.p0: My inbox is always open to suggestion and new exploring paths. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!

work.title: Some of the projects I've built

content.p0: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam

I like to build products for the web with a special focus on great user interfaces and user experiences. My areas of expertise are design, code and accessibility. I perceive myself as team player who truly believes in collaborative work to create new products and overcome any challenges that arise.
content.p1: I work with a range of JavaScript frameworks/libraries like React but my personal go to choice is Vue.
content.p2: Below listed some of the technologies I’ve been working with recently. I like to learn new skills so if you don’t see it on the list, I’m keen to  hear about it and take on new challenges:
